title: Games minified
content: I minified the code for HTML5 games, meaning faster load times. please report any errors in the discord

title: Few new updates
content: I redid the news system, removed shitty anylitics (you children probalbly dont know what this means), and I fixed duck life (hopefully)

title: Half Life one added!
content: Half life one! Warning: You must supply your own game files to play HL mods, spinoffs, or anything other than the first fifth of the game.

title: Flash game code re-made!
content: I re did the flash game code, making it easier than ever just to shove them on my site. join the discord and send an .swf file and i can add that right when i see it!

title: First customer!
content: Someone paid me $5 to add time shootrs 3! thanks!

title: Yes, i know insecurly is down.
content: No shit, i know when stuff i put time into breaks. No, i cannot fix it, and I will stop working on this site too if you people dont stop bugging me. Use your phones to join the discord if you wanna send a game request

title: Game requests open!
content: Join the discord to request a game! (Yes, we can put flash games on the site, like with bad piggies)

title: Napoleon Games is back!
content: Now better than ever, we actually used proper html and css for this site.
